valuation_report.client_address: Bunyala Rd / Lower Hill Rd Junction; P.O. Box 6450 - 00200, Nairobi, Kenya.
valuation_report.purpose: To provide professional opinion on Open Market, Mortgage/Insurable Values, Reserved prices, and Forced/Auction sale value for land and permanent buildings/developments.

title_details.area: 0.093 of a hectare or 0.2298 of an acre approximately

market_assessment.general_remarks: The immediate neighbourhood is characterised mainly with stand-alone residential developments and complementary social amenities. Infrastructural facilities are available in the neighbourhood. The sustained improvement of infrastructure across board has opened up areas that were hitherto considered fringe areas. Gikambura and the general Kikuyu area has benefited from such hence pushing property values up. However, due to the struggles in the local economy and by extension the global economy has adversely affected the demand for property leading to a dipped property market. A continued but measured growth in the sector is anticipated going forward into the foreseeable future.

compliance.public_utility_user: The property has not been set aside for public use/water catchment area, is not government land, and has not been reserved for public utility user. It is not listed in the Report of the Commission of Inquiry into the Illegal/Irregular Allocation of Public Land (Ndungu Report) Annexes Volumes 1, 2 & 3. The land is not adversely mentioned in the National Land Commission (NLC) Kenya Gazette Notice No. 6862 of 17th July 2017, 12526 of 22nd December 2017, 2032 and 2033 of 2nd March 2018 and 1547 of 15th February 2019. The land is not on riparian reserve / wetland.
compliance.planning_statutory_considerations: There is no significant prospect of or potential for change of use of the subject property or those in the vicinity, which could materially affect the value of the subject property in the past or in future. The current user of the property conforms to its stipulated use.
compliance.environmental_issues: There are currently no other obvious visible environmental issues including contaminated land either on the subject or on an adjoining site that materially affect the value of the property.
